line.originaltext: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 (3 pound) whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces")

line.originaltext: 1/2 cup soy sauce
3/4 cup distilled white vinegar
1 bulb garlic, peeled and crushed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 bulb garlic, peeled and crushed")

line.originaltext: 2 tablespoons thinly sliced fresh ginger root
line.annotation: create_ing(ing4, "2 tablespoons thinly sliced fresh ginger root")

line.originaltext: 2 bay leaves
1/2 tablespoon black peppercorns
Combine the chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, ginger, bay leaves and peppercorns in a Dutch oven.

line.originaltext: Combine the chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, ginger, bay leaves and peppercorns in a Dutch oven.
Bring to a boil over medium heat.
